saravanan:
Hello Saravanan,

As you probably know by now, I’m leaving Kinettix and before I go, I just really wanted to say something to you.

Thank you. Honestly, thank you for everything.

From the very beginning, you’ve been more than just a team lead/manager to me. You’ve been a mentor, someone I looked up to and learned so much from. Your guidance and support helped me grow not just as a tester, but as a person. You believed in me, even during times I doubted myself. That kind of trust meant a lot...

Take care always – Ramon
